ovdesc.p: This file is a concat file to the MI.COF.ENTRIES file.

When records on this file exceed two hundred lines (ie more than two hundred MI.COF.ENTRIES records were produced for one month for the file type being processed) a new record is created, and the sequence number is incremented.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The key to the MI.COF.ENTRIES.XREF records. The key is composed of three parts, seperated by the '*' character ;
a) The file type which produced the entries. This part of the key will either hold 'ACCOUNT' or 'CONTRACT' depending on the type of BALANCE.MOVEMENT record which produced the entry.
b) The year and month to which the cost of funds entries refer.
